cms.query.QueryText: SELECT AddressPersonalName,AddressZip,AddressName,AddressCity,AddressPhone,states.StateDisplayName,SKUImagePath,sku.SKUID, country.CountryDisplayName,cart.ShoppingCartID,ShoppingCartDistributorID,SKUName,SKUNumber,SKUUnits,SKUPrice,SKUPrice*SKUUnits AS SKUUnitsPrice,sku.SKUValidUntil, cartSKU.SKUProductCustomerReferenceNumber FROM COM_Address customer INNER JOIN COM_ShoppingCart cart ON customer.AddressID =cart.ShoppingCartDistributorID INNER JOIN COM_ShoppingCartSKU cartSKU on cart.ShoppingCartID=cartSKU.ShoppingCartID INNER JOIN COM_SKU sku ON cartSKU.SKUID=sku.SKUID LEFT JOIN CMS_Country country ON customer.AddressCountryID=country.CountryID LEFT JOIN CMS_State states ON customer.AddressStateID=states.StateID WHERE cart.ShoppingCartID=@ShoppingCartUserID AND ShoppingCartInventoryType=@ShoppingCartInventoryType AND ShoppingCartCampaignID= CASE WHEN ShoppingCartInventoryType=2 THEN @ShoppingCartCampaignID ELSE 0 END
